backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles and surgery case types with access control and CRUD operations, storing cases per caller principal.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a demographics‑paste bug fix to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files covering hooks, utilities, components, and case‑management logic.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_NOTES.md: Documentation describing when and how to redeploy the frontend with fresh backend bindings.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React frontend via main.tsx.
frontend/redeploy.sh: Script performing deterministic frontend redeploy with clean rebuild and deployment steps.
Script that wipes old build artifacts, reinstalls dependencies, regenerates backend bindings, and rebuilds the frontend.
frontend/scripts/verify-live-backend-bin: Guide explaining how to verify that the live frontend uses fresh backend bindings and the correct canister ID.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, profile setup, case list, case form modals, sorting, and search.
frontend/src/components/cases/CameraCapt: Empty file placeholder for a camera capture component.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseCard.t: Renders a surgery case card with patient details, arrival info, complaint, owner data, and a tasks checklist with local/server sync.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseForm.t: Form for creating or editing cases with demographics, tasks, prefill logic, and state management for saving.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseList.t: Displays searchable and sortable case cards with loading, empty states, and migration guidance.
Date input component combining a text field and calendar popover with validation.
frontend/src/components/cases/Demographi: Textarea that extracts and returns demographics when text is pasted.
frontend/src/components/cases/EmptyCases: Shows empty state messaging and optional migration guidance based on authentication and connectivity.
frontend/src/components/cases/SortContro: Controls for selecting sort field and toggling ascending/descending order.
frontend/src/components/cases/TasksCheck: Renders required tasks with checkboxes and handles task toggling after normalization.
frontend/src/components/csv/CsvExportBut: Exports current cases to a downloadable CSV file with success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/csv/CsvImportDia: UI dialog for uploading a CSV, parsing rows into cases, showing warnings/errors, and importing them via store mutation.
frontend/src/components/errors/ModalErro: Error boundary for modal content that logs details and shows a fallback alert with a close button.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying app copyright and link attribution with dynamic year and hostname tracking.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with app title, environment badge, and login/logout handling using Internet Identity and query reset.
frontend/src/components/startup/StartupR: Recovery screen shown on startup failures, displaying error details and offering retry or reload actions.
frontend/src/components/sync/SyncStatusB: Status bar showing online state, backend connection state, and providing retry and sync controls with error toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on identity, auto-initializing access control and invalidating queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Wrapper hook around useActor that tracks initialization failures, exposes errors, and provides retry logic.
Manages backend connectivity by combining identity, actor init, and a probe query, exposing connection state and a retry function.
frontend/src/hooks/useCasesStore.ts: Merges local and server surgery cases and provides mutations for adding, updating, deleting, and importing cases with local persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnvironmentLabel.t: Determines whether the app is in Draft or Live mode based on URL hostname.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading and managing identity state, login flow, and logout behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status using window events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for profiles and surgery cases with authorization-aware error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSync.ts: Synchronizes local cases with the server, handling pending changes, merging results, and updating local and query state.
frontend/src/index.css: TailwindCSS base styles and theme variables for light and dark mode.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function to merge Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/types/cases.ts: Defines extended surgery case and form data types for local use, adding fields like localId, pendingSync, and raw demographics text.
Classifies backend errors into categories and provides user-friendly messages, with helpers for actor initialization failures.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Converts surgery cases to CSV and parses CSV files into structured rows with validation, warnings, and error reporting.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Provides timezone-safe utilities for validating, formatting, and converting date-only strings and nanosecond timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/demographicsExtract.t: Extracts patient demographics from pasted text using regex-based pattern matching to infer fields like MRN, name, and species.
frontend/src/utils/draftAdminToken.ts: Retrieves and checks the Draft admin token from URL or sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/localPersistence.ts: Loads, normalizes, saves, and clears locally stored surgery cases with BigInt-safe JSON handling.
frontend/src/utils/mergeCases.ts: Merges local and server surgery cases, preserving local-only fields, and prepares cases for sync by combining pending local changes with server data.
frontend/src/utils/prefill.ts: Provides helpers to find the latest case by MRN and extract patient demographic fields for prefill.
frontend/src/utils/tasksChecklist.ts: Defines task metadata and utilities to create, normalize, and derive required/checked task checklists.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-stored parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, issues, and a fix request related to Quick Add demographics paste flow.
